attributes.action: Alter the way the dwp go about ' fraudulant claims investigations...'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make the department of works and pensions be legaly bound to check all the facts before stopping innocent peoples disability benefits. The dwp should carry out their own surveilance on a person before stopping a persons benefit. NOT just act on a letter sent to them by a jealous and vindictive neighbour. The way that the dwp go about checking on these complaints is discusting, but because it is a Goverment Department they seem to be above the law. The whole system stinks and requires a massive shake up.
